item.title: Kevin Stefanski to Falcons: Grading the hire and the impact on Penix
item.description: Kevin Stefanski didn't have a great record in Cleveland, but he'll have more talent to work with in Atlanta.

item.title: Los Angeles prevails in divisional round win over Chicago
item.description: The Bears had been kings of comeback wins, but the Rams are the ones advancing to the NFC title game.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea open to Fernández exit; Madrid, PSG interested
item.description: Chelsea's Enzo Fernández could be available this summer as Real Madrid and PSG monitor his situation. Transfer Talk has the latest.
